channel.title: ARVA Product Feed
channel.description: Google Merchant Center feed for ARVA (livearva.com)

item.g:title: Arva Atlas Modular Sectional Sofa – Cloud Style – Washable Fabric – Taupe
item.g:description: Modular cloud-style sectional sofa with washable performance fabric and tool-free assembly. Built for flexible layouts and deep seating support. Upholstered in durable performance fabric for everyday living in modern spaces. Reconfigures as your room evolves. Lifetime structural warranty included.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas

g:product_detail.g:attribute_value: 102 in W × 65 in D × 25 in H

Upholstered in durable performance fabric for everyday use. Ideal for apartments, offices, and flexible living areas. Lifetime structural warranty included.

g:product_detail.g:attribute_value: 75 in W × 38 in D × 25 in H
